thread.title: Christie Brinkley's kids model for Town & Country
thread.title_full: Christie Brinkley's kids model for Town & Country - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Christie Brinkley's kids model for Town & Country
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo NEW YORK, Oct. 14 (UPI) -- Christie Brinkley 's son and younger daughter recently modeled for Town & Country.
The 61-year-old model proudly revealed MOnday on Instagram that 20-year-old Jack Cook and 17-year-old Sailor Cook will appear in the magazine's November issue.
"My two 'little ones' from their editorial spread in @townandcountrymag November issue student/photog/model @sailorbrinkleycook and actor/student @jackbrinkleycook fabulous photography by @matthewbrookes," she captioned a photo of the pair.
Sailor Cook signed with IMG Models in 2013, and appeared in the September issue of Seventeen. The teenager plans to attend the Parsons School for photography, and told Town & Country pursuing modeling can be daunting.
"It can be hard to be up-and-coming and constantly compared to an icon," she confessed. "Right now I'm focusing on working hard in school and getting into college."
Christie Brinkley's youngest children, Jack and Sailor Cook, for the November issue of Town & Country. Photo by Matthew Brookes for Town & Country on Christie Brinkley /Instagram Brinkley shares Jack and Sailor with fourth husband Peter Cook , whom she divorced after 12 years of marriage in 2008. The model is also mother to 29-year-old daughter Alexa Ray Joel with first husband Billy Joel , who recently poked fun at her relationship with John Mellencamp .
  Billy Joel jokes about Christie Brinkley dating John Mellencamp Christie Brinkley, John Mellencamp spotted again on date Christie Brinkley's daughter models for Seventeen Billy Joel, wife welcome daughter Della Rose Joel
